text: Jinzhi nimen shiyong de shi: Zi si wu, xieye, zhurou, nian fei an la zhi ming er zai de, lei si de, da si de, die si de, chu si de, yeshou chiguo de, dan nimen [zai ta huozhe shi jishi nian an la zhi ming] zaiguo de reng keyi chi. Hai jinzhi shiyong zai ji shi [jitan] shang zai de [zhu 1], bingqie jinzhi nimen qiuqian, zhexie dou shi beini xingwei. Jintian, bu xinyang zhe dui [xiaomie] nimen de zongjiao juewangle, yinci, nimen buyao haipa tamen, nimen dang weiju wo. Jintian, wo yi wei nimen wanshanle nimen de zongjiao, wo yi wancheng wo dui nimen de enhui, wo manyi yu yisilan jiao zuo nimen de zongjiao [zhu 2]. Dan ruoshi pobudeyi er bingfei xiang fanzui,[qie wei chaoyue fadu, name, chi zhexie jinwu meiyou zuiguo.] An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
